title-of-article: The INSPIRATION: AGITATION exhibit / Event Report / News / / Sony
content:
Cooking, arranging flowers, scribbling, talking—creativity is everywhere in our daily lives. 

 Take a second to look into our creativity, and enjoy being that creator.

 Someone told me that "Walking on a predetermined path is boring," but is there really such a thing as a predetermined road?

 When we look at the world, we have no idea what to expect.

Nobody knows what lies in our future; the world changes every day.

What does the future look like for the relationship between "humans" and "technology?" Technology has enriched our lives, but will there be a day when technology overtakes human beings?

 Rather than thinking about dominating or being dominated, I personally want to live in harmony with technology, and I believe we can do it.

 Look at "water" and "oil." They don’t mix at first, but after a while, they harmonize to create delicious salad dressing.

 I think creativity in all of us will be key to harmonizing humanity and technology to enrich our lives.
